overview: Director, John Smith, takes his band of hot and horny cock lovers to Italy, for a blisteringly hot vacation that none of them (or you!) will ever forget. Not that the likes of Connor Levi, Brad Fitt or everyone’s favourite stallion, Rudy Bodlak, ever get much chance to enjoy the sights and sounds of the Mediterranean. With so much poolside ass and dick on offer they’re all far too busy sucking and fucking to venture far. Their loss, however, is most certainly your gain; as the horniest holiday of a lifetime turns these boys into Italian cum-crazed sluts!
title: The Italian Job
